title: Johnson Controls
summary: Johnson Controls International is an American [3]  Irish-domiciled multinational conglomerate headquartered in Cork, Ireland,[4] that produces fire, HVAC, and security equipment for buildings. As of mid-2019, it employed 105,000 people in around 2,000 locations across six continents.[5] As of 2017, it was listed as 389th in the Fortune Global 500;[6] in 2017, it became ineligible for the Fortune 500, as it was headquartered outside the U.S.[7]
